attributes.description: At AutoCity Group we understand how important buying a vehicle is for our customers. And we go out of our way to ensure we deliver to the standards you would expect. We design a package around your budget. All prices exclude administration, delivery and license registration fees. Prices subject to change without prior notice. Test drives welcome. Finance available through all major banks. Finance is subject to Bank Approval. Optional Warranty and Service plans available. Tradeins will be considered. Ts Cs Apply. EOE.

attributes.description: Excellent Condition with a Full Service History with Porsche! BB Group is a well-established Franchise with a wide variety. We strive to give excellent service. All Trade-ins are welcome. A Full and Detailed Workshop Quality Inspection is Done on Each of the vehicles along with a AA Dekra Roadworthy test prior to any Delivery taken. This is to ensure peace of mind for each of our valued customers. For Excellent Service Contact our Sales Manager – Linden Jacobs As part of a 60-year legacy, this fully-fledged automotive dealer group offers New Cars, Used Cars, Parts, and services to all existing and potential customers. With us, you can always expect a little more and once you’re a client, it is hardly a fleeting experience but potentially a life-long partnership. To find out more about this vehicle, contact the dealer now.

attributes.description:
All vehicles are available for CASH,FINANCE AND RENT TO OWN ON SELECTED CARS. Roadworthy are subject to payment for Change of ownership. Our finance is done through all major banks with an additional administrative charge of  R10.000- R15.000 depending on the car. Trade-ins are also accepted , delivery is nationwide and fees are charged based on location. Buying a used car from us means buying Peace of mind, Quality, Choice and Value. 
PRE-OWNED CAR DEALERSHIP IN GAUTENG JOHANNESBURG WITH VEHICLES IN EXCELLENT CONDITION. YOU CAN COME THROUGH TO OUR DEALERSHIP AT NO. 6 JOUBERT STREET AND CORNER ALBERT, BEHIND SARS OFFICES. PLEASE DO CONTACT OUR EXECUTIVE SALES REP. VUYO ON 0763933070 OR CALL ON 0100234810. 

THANK YOU. SIYABONGA. KEALEBOHA. DANKIE.

attributes.description: NMG Cape Town Quality Guarantee: As a standard included in your Service & Delivery Fee, all of our vehicles go for a full 160 Point Workshop Check as well as a roadworthy test to ensure that the vehicle is mechanically sound. We will attend to any minor dents or scratches to the exterior of the vehicle should there be any. A full interior valet & exterior polish is performed on each of our pre-owned vehicles at point of sale. Extended Service Plans & Warranties are available as an optional extra and can be bolted on to your finance. A variety of finance options available, tailor made to suite your pocket. Trade Ins are welcome! **Service & Delivery Fee not included in the advertised price.
